name: Searching the Unknown
description:
History

You will live as Antonio Dellavega, a young detective early in his career, your job will be to investigate the president of your country, alone and without resources you will have to use your own abilities to complete your mission.
Seek, question, think, everything is essential to complete your goals..
only then will you reach the true end.

Gameplay

It is a RpgMV style game with multiple choices that change your path and even its end.With variable interaction and turn-based battles, a little slip and you can take everything to lose.
You can also make use of items and prizes won during the course of the game.

System requirement for Smartphones

Android 6.0 or higher
